subject: College Athletics
Television
Football
Football (College)
Cable Television
lead_paragraph: The Big 12 Conference and Fox Sports reached a 13-year agreement for cable television rights to 40 football games a season beginning next year, in addition to other events.
snippet: The Big 12 Conference and Fox Sports reached a 13-year agreement for cable television rights to 40 football games a season beginning next year, in addition to other events.
